full_summary:
**FREQUENCY STANDARD TENDER NOTICE**

**Reference Number:** CB-888-26660023

**Tender Status:** Expiré (Expired)

**Publication Date:** November 8, 2023

**Tender Closing Date:** December 18, 2023, 14:00:00

**Notice Type:** Demande de propositions (Request for Proposal)

**Procurement Method:** Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner (Competitive - Open bidding)

This tender notice is issued for the supply of FREQUENCY STANDARD to the Department of National Defence. The contract will be awarded based on the lowest price.

**Configuration Specifications:**

The Department of National Defence requires:

* Frequency Standard (Quantity: 2)
	+ NSN:  6625-01-467-2621
	+ P/N: 5071A-C001 or equivalent
	+ NSCM/MFG: Microsemi Technology
* Certificate of Calibration (Quantity: 2)

**Delivery Requirements:**

The requested delivery date for the above-mentioned goods is September 30, 2024.

**Tender Documents:**

* RFP document: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/24366/w8486-249275-cesium-rfp-eng.pdf> (English version)
* RFP document: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/24366/w8486-249275-cesium-rfp-fr.pdf> (French version)
* Amendment document: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/24366/w8486-249275a-amendment-001-eng.pdf> (English version)
* Amendment document: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/24366/w8486-249275a-amendment-001-fr.pdf> (French version)

**Buyer's Information:**

* Buyer's Name: Justin Laundrie
* Buyer's Email: <justin.laundrie@forces.gc.ca>
* Buyer's Phone: (343) 571-8929
* Buyer's Address: 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, ON K1A0K2, Canada

Note: The notice URL and fax information are not available in the source data provided. Please contact the buyer for more information.
